QueryResult.text: SELECT i.id roadmap_item_key, i.roadmap_id roadmap_key, i.scenario_id scenario_key, NVL(i.actual_capital_cost,0) + NVL(i.actual_operating_cost,0) actual_total_cost, NVL(i.actual_capital_cost,0) actual_capital_cost, NVL(i.actual_operating_cost,0) actual_operating_cost, NVL(i.benefit,0) benefit, NVL(i.capacity,0) capacity, NVL(i.actual,0) actual_capacity, NVL(i.capacity,0) - NVL(i.actual,0) remain_capacity, NVL(i.irr,0) * 100 irr, NVL(i.npv,0) npv, NVL(i.roi,0) * 100 roi, NVL(i.capital_cost,0) + NVL(i.operating_cost,0) total_cost, NVL(i.capital_cost,0) capital_cost, NVL(i.operating_cost,0) operating_cost, (NVL(i.capital_cost,0) + NVL(i.operating_cost,0)) - (NVL(i.actual_capital_cost,0) + NVL(i.actual_operating_cost,0)) remain_total_cost, NVL(i.capital_cost,0) - NVL(i.actual_capital_cost,0) remain_capital_cost, NVL(i.operating_cost,0) - NVL(i.actual_operating_cost,0) remain_operating_cost, i.last_updated_date clarity_updated_date FROM rdm_roadmap_items i WHERE 1=1
